attributes.action: Halt legislation intended to make the photography and filming of police an offence.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The capture of film and photography of on-duty police officers is a necessary check and balance on police use of power.

Pending legislation intends to make the capture of film and photography an offence. The undersigned contend that the creation of this offence will lead to insecurity in the nation and allow for the abuse of police powers unchecked.

The powers of the Independent Police Complaints Commission and other government agencies will be severely restricted by this legislation. The freedom of the press will be severely restricted by this legislation. Police accountability will be severely restricted by this legislation. Citizens with an honourable concern for their communities and their nation will be criminalized by this legislation.
